news.content:
Here's a quick look at the first three months of 2021 for ThreeFold:

üöÄ The TF Grid technology made huge steps forward (v2.4, v2.5, eVDC, QSFS, Marketplace, & more)

üëØ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Our digital avatar called Digital Twin nears testing phase

‚úÖ 3Node Pre-Order Batch 1 of 2021 has closed (welcome, new farmers!)

Find the full update here, with more details.
news.excerpt: A lot unfolded in our universe the last three months. Find out all you need to know in our Q1 Recap!
